win32-x64.note: Experimental Cygwin build - no official Windows binaries available

notes.license: Apache-2.0 - Fully permissive for commercial use
notes.github-releases: Official binaries from GitHub Releases at https://github.com/ClickHouse/ClickHouse/releases
notes.linux: Linux binaries from clickhouse-common-static tarball contain the main clickhouse binary
notes.macos: macOS binaries are single monolithic executables (not tarballs), wrapped in tar.gz by download.ts
notes.windows: No official Windows support - experimental Cygwin build attempted in CI
notes.checksums: ClickHouse provides SHA-512 checksums; sha256 field left null for now
notes.single-binary: ClickHouse uses a single binary with subcommands: clickhouse server, clickhouse client, clickhouse local
